We build futuristic electical vehicles.

The environment needs conservation and people need development. We focus on achieving both by building machines that run on environment friendly technology.

Mission

We are on a mission to bring affordable high-tech electrical vehicle to all.

Vision

We see a world dominated by eco-friendly electric based transport system in the next 5 years. We see ourself as a major player in this transformation.

End-user centered approach

We believe that everything should be designed keeping in view the person who will actually use it.

Building vehicles to the future.

We envision a future driven by latest eco-friendly technology which are affordable and practical because technology should uplift everyone.
